function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Rapid deployment of technology without proper testing and validation may lead to errors in decision-making and resource allocation.","category":"Tools&Apps","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of digitized information for pandemic response","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on digital tooling for data collection","category":"Tools&Apps","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Incomplete or biased data collection","category":"Tools&Apps","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Under-notification of cases may lead to distorted results","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of digital tools for healthcare support","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Transposition of activities to virtual platforms may not optimize public administration activities, but only digitize processes.","category":"Working","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Simple replacement of physical activities with digital processes may be a shallow level of technological impact.","category":"Working","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dependency on telephone exchange as a communication strategy may be anachronistic compared to digital devices.","category":"Tools&Apps","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unclear source and intermediate hosts of sars-cov-2","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Disease transmission from person-to-person","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Asymptomatic carriers as potential source of virus spread","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Modes of virus transmission including direct and indirect contact, respiratory droplets, and fecal-oral route","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Long incubation period of up to 27 days increases the risk of asymptomatic transmission and delayed detection.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Transmission of covid-19 from person to person","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Failure to identify and isolate infected persons promptly","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Contact with patients diagnosed positive for sars-cov-2 virus infection","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Complex health and ecological challenges may not be adequately addressed through holistic systems-thinking, leading to inefficient interventions.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Competing or incompatible ecosystem services in urban green spaces may lead to suboptimal provision of services to humans and wildlife.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Changing the focus of environment and animals as sources of diseases towards salutogenic approaches","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited diversity of exposures and stimuli in mental health studies","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Population density around green space affecting safety perception and wildlife richness","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Positive correlation between urban wildlife support and vegetation structure may lead to increased contact between humans and wildlife, increasing the risk of zoonotic disease transmission.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Design features such as water bodies, footpaths alignment, and habitat heterogeneity may impact human behavior and perception, potentially affecting the spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Positive impact of biological sounds and geophysical sounds on restoration, stress recovery, and tranquility perception","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inconsistent relationship between actual and perceived levels of biodiversity in green spaces","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Perception of biodiversity may not be fully correlated to actual biodiversity levels","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Influence of setting characteristics on biodiversity perception","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential correlation between activities and perceived restorativeness and well-being","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Correlation between connection to nature and perceived biodiversity, and gender with perceived safety","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Laboratory experiments using visual stimuli and students as participants may not fully represent the reality of user experience in green spaces or the characteristics of the whole population.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Role of perceived safety in urban green spaces","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Indicators of green space quality are influenced by outcomes in bird assemblages, leading to potential bias in wildlife outcome assessments.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Conflicts between human and wildlife dimensions in green spaces","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unestablished aspects in the relationship between mental health, wildlife, and green spaces","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Conflicts related to the naturalness level of vegetation in green spaces","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate evidence on the effect of green space qualities on mental health","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential human health risks, such as zoonotic and vector-borne diseases, associated with enhancing biodiversity in urban areas","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Neglected intangible benefits of wildlife to humans","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for multiple dimensions under a socioecological-systems perspective","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Researchers from multiple institutions and countries collaborating on principles","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Pandemic-induced changes in energy use impacting patterns of interaction with energy systems","category":"Wealth Distribution","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Challenges in disentangling the impacts of pandemic measures on energy use","category":"Wealth Distribution","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uncertain implications for public commitment to low-carbon energy transitions","category":"Wealth Distribution","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential exposure to sensitive data categories such as physical or mental health information","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Differential effects of unexpected deprivation from work income on energy-related measures","category":"Wealth Distribution","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Differentiated impacts on health, income, and employment situation across ethnicities, gender, and income groups","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inability to accurately predict changes associated with energy-relevant outcomes","category":"Wealth Distribution","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Decreased salience and malleability of manipulated variables in experimental research","category":"Wealth Distribution","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Heterogeneous restrictions leading to varied study results","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"}]}
